articles.title: Roh Moo Hyun Dies
articles.content:
Roh Moo Hyun Dies
Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- Roh Moo Hyun, former President of south Korea, died on Saturday morning, according to a report.
					 Media at home and abroad are linking the motive of his death with the mental burden caused by the intensive investigation of the prosecution.

articles.title: Greetings to King of Jordan
articles.content:
Greetings to King of Jordan
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Sunday sent a message of greetings to Abdullah II, King of Jordan, on the occasion of the 63rd anniversary of its independence. 
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the bonds of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger and wished him and the friendly Jordanian people greater progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Chairman of African Union
articles.content:
Greetings to Chairman of African Union
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Sunday sent a message of greetings to Jean Ping, chairman of the Committee of the African Union, on the occasion of the Day of Africa. 
					 Kim in the message said it is the firm belief of the DPRK government and people that the African Union and its member nations will promote the socio-economic stability and development by their concerted efforts, successfully solve the problems of the region including disputes and surely achieve the unity and prosperity on the continent. 
					
					 The message expressed belief that the long-standing relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and the African Union and its member nations would develop on a new higher stage in the future and sincerely wished him greater success in his responsible work to strengthen the union.

articles.title: Vol. 80 of "Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works" Off Press
articles.content:
Vol. 80 of "Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works" Off Press
Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- Volume 80 of the "Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works", a library of the Juche idea which systematically and comprehensively deals in chronological order with Kim Il Sung's works, was published by the Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House. 
					 The book contains the President's 43 works including his speeches and talks made in the period from July to December, Juche 73 (1984).
					
					 The works comprehensively deal with the original ideas and theories and policies on victoriously advancing the revolution and construction as required by the revolutionary development on a new higher level.
					
					 Works including "Let Us Thoroughly Implement the System and Method of Juche-oriented Economic Management" and "On Improving and Strengthening the Socialist Economic Management" clarify the principled issues which the officials should consider as guidelines for guiding and managing the socialist economy.
					
					 "We Must Increase Power Production by Building Many Hydroelectric Power Stations," "On Increasing the Production of Structural Steel and Energetically Waging the Movement for Reclaiming Tideland and Obtaining New Land," "Some Tasks Facing the Mining Industry, the Machine Industry and the Chemical Industry," and other works specify tasks facing each sector of the national economy to bring about a turn in the socialist economic construction.
					
					 Such works as "We Must Lay out the Main Street of Mangyongdae District in Modern Style" and "On Successfully Building Ssuk Islet into a Recreation Ground" clarify the tasks and ways to improve the standard of people's living.
					
					 The President in various works including "A Talk with the Delegation of the Japan Socialist Party" and "A Talk with the Delegation of the Irish Workers' Party" gave perfect answers to the theoretical and practical questions arising in accomplishing national reunification and the cause of global independence.
					
					 The book also contains works which clarify the issues of working out national economy plans well, intensifying the drive for economization and further improving and strengthening the technical management and other issues.

articles.title: Danger of Plan for Formation of "Democratic Union" Revealed
articles.content:
Danger of Plan for Formation of "Democratic Union" Revealed
Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- The plan for establishing "a democratic union" advocated by the U.S. indicates that it is still keen to get rid of the abyss of ruin by resorting to high-handed and arbitrary practices and hegemony and creating the danger of a fresh world war, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a signed article. 
					 A scrutiny into the above-said plan now under discussion in the political circle in the U.S. and the diplomatic and security team of the present U.S. administration proves that the U.S. strategy to dominate the world in the new century is in the process of transition from the one of hegemony based on unilateralism to that based on the alliance with "democratic countries", the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. seeks a foolish aim to form the "democratic union" and turn the international relations now unfavorable for it in favor of it by playing a main role and thus put the world under its control. 
					
					 If the U.S.-led "democratic union" is formed to replace the UN, the international forces will divide into two poles again, increasing the danger of the outbreak of a new world war.
					
					 What matters here is that this plan has not yet been adopted as a policy in the U.S. but, in fact, there are already moves for its implementation.
					
					 If the U.S. opts for expanding the NATO toward the Asia-Pacific region to form a new military bloc, this means laying a siege not only to the DPRK but to China, Russia and other countries. 
					
					 As long as U.S. imperialism exists in the world it will never be free from the danger of a war and arbitrary practices for hegemony and domination.
					
					 The DPRK will stand firm against the U.S. imperialists and their followers' moves to provoke a new war under the uplifted banner of Songun while boosting unity and solidarity with world anti-imperialist and independence forces including the peace movement.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-DPRK Reckless Remarks Blasted
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-DPRK Reckless Remarks Blasted
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- Confidants of Lee Myung Bak are vying with each other these days to let loose reckless remarks against the DPRK. Shortly ago, the south Korean minister of Unification at a "forum on the policy toward the north" urged the north to "withdraw the stand of rejecting the six-party talks" and "stop posing the threat of nuclear test and launching intercontinental ballistic missiles" and the like. And the presidential secretary for foreign strategy of Chongwadae at a "seminar" cried out for making a decision on the final terminal called complete dismantlement of nukes and so on. 
					 Mandarins of the ministries of "National Defence" and "Foreign Affairs and Trade" also vied with each other to let loose similar outbursts. 
					
					 Minju Joson Sunday says in a signed commentary in this regard:   
					
					 It is very pitiful for the Lee Myung Bak group to say this or that about the just and legitimate measures for self-defence taken by the DPRK, just repeating what the United States said without knowing how the security and peace have been protected on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It is ridiculous, indeed, for all of them to echo the utterances of their U.S. master, feeling neither shame nor disgrace.
					
					 The United States and its followers have perpetrated silly acts unprecedented in the history of the UN only to prove themselves that they remain unchanged in their policy to isolate and stifle the DPRK, depriving the six-party talks of any justification to go on any longer. This being a hard reality, the group is talking nonsense, pursuant to the policy of the U.S. which brought the talks to collapse. This reminds one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 As a matter of fact, the U.S. and its followers are compelling the army and people of the DPRK to bolster up its nuclear deterrent for self-defense in every way. This is clearly evidenced by the fact that the present U.S. administration and the Lee Myung Bak group worked hard to stifle the DPRK by force of arms over its satellite launch. 
					
					 If the group keeps going mad with the moves to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen, echoing the utterances of the U.S. as it does now, it will have to pay a dear price for its behavior, warns the commentary.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Letter Sent to Officials of Chongryon Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Letter Sent to Officials of Chongryon Observed
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent a letter "On Developing the Movement of Koreans in Japan onto a New Higher Stage" to the officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and Korean residents in Japan on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of its formation 14 years ago. 
					  The letter comprehensively dealt with the immortal leadership feats performed by President Kim Il Sung in the history of the movement of Koreans in Japan and clarified the issues of protecting the democratic national rights and interests of Koreans, defending the socialist homeland and struggling for the prosperity and development of the country and reunification, etc. 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in a signed article dedicated to the anniversary:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's historic letter serves as an immortal great programme which helped bring about a landmark turn in the movement of Koreans in Japan and provided a sure guarantee for its rosy future by indicating the orientation and ways for Chongryon to creditably perform its sacred mission and duty it assumed before the country and the nation as required by the changed situation and the law-governed requirements of its development. 
					
					 The past more than decade since the publication of the letter was the most difficult period for Chongryon but neither trial nor difficulties could deter the officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan from dynamically advancing, convinced of the justice of their cause, tightly holding the treasured sword of patriotism given by Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Unshakable is the faith of the officials of Chongryon and Korean residents in Japan to advance, taking his historic letter as an immortal banner of the patriotic cause no matter how much water may flow under the bridge. 
					
					 The stirring reality of the homeland where the might of Songun Korea is growing stronger as the days go by and a fresh great revolutionary surge is being effected in the building of a thriving nation greatly inspire the officials of Chongryon and Korean residents in Japan and reinforces their will to bring about a fresh upswing in the movement of Koreans in Japan, keeping pace with the grandiose march of the people in the homeland, and thus fully demonstrate the dignity and might of Chongryon.

articles.title: Struggle for Global Independence Called for
articles.content:
Struggle for Global Independence Called for
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- There may be turns and twists in the course of the advance of history, but the main orientation of historical development can never change and no force on earth can stem the trend of global independence. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The developing countries, the anti-imperialist independent countries, are striving hard to accelerate the historical development, while increasing their position and influence in the international arena. 
					
					 The imperialist forces are the biggest hurdle in realizing the global independence at present.
					
					 The imperialists have unhesitatingly committed the military intervention and war of aggression against independent countries, pursuant to their policy for domination. 
					
					 Due to their policy of aggression and war and their moves for domination the sovereignty of the independent countries are violated, international peace and order are disturbed, international law is disregarded and the world is put into a mayhem. 
					
					 The imperialists' desperate moves for aggression and war are a revelation of their consciousness of crisis and the last-ditch efforts to prolong their remaining days. The world people should hold high the banner of the anti-imperialist and anti-war struggle, clearly understanding that their bluffing is an expression of vulnerability, not an expression of their mightiness. 
					
					 In order to foil the imperialists' moves for aggression and domination it is necessary to strengthen anti-imperialist and independent forces. 
					
					 All the countries and people desirous of independence should go united. 
					
					 It is necessary to expand and develop the Non-aligned Movement and strengthen the south-south cooperation on the principle of collective self-reliance in order to make the whole world independent. 
					
					 Thanks to the strenuous struggle of the progressive people aspiring after independence, the imperialist and hegemonic forces will find themselves in a tighter corner with each passing day and the cause of global independence make faster progress, the article concludes.

articles.title: Group of Traitors' Suppression Denounced in S. Korea
articles.content:
Group of Traitors' Suppression Denounced in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- The Network of Civic and Public Organizations to Defend Democracy and Check the Suppression under the pretext of "security" grouping more than 80 civic and public organizations including the Solidarity for Progress, the Citizens' Solidarity for Democratic Society and the Confederation of Trade Unions of south Korea, and the People's Council for Livelihood and Democracy made up of more than 500 civic and public organizations held a joint press conference in Seoul on May 20 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak puppet group of traitors' reckless suppression.
					 The press release read out at the press conference disclosed that the police specified and kicked up a racket for arresting  2,500 persons from all walks of life as "habitual demonstrators," while mercilessly suppressing rallies and demonstrations after labeling them "illegal ones."
					
					 Deploring that rallies and demonstrations are being incriminated on this land, the press release demanded the puppet authorities stop at once such fascist crackdown as letting policemen brandish lethal weapons against the citizens in their just struggle.
					
					 Action programs of the organizations were made public at the press conference.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Pro-Reunification Movement Organizations Flailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Pro-Reunification Movement Organizations Flailed
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- Demonstrations denouncing the puppet authorities' suppression of the South Side Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) were simultaneously held across south Korea on May 20.
					 Members of various civic and public organizations including the permanent co-representative of the joint measure committee of civic and public organization to counter suppression of Pomminryon and the chairman of the emergency measure committee of Pomminryon to defend the June 15 joint declaration staged a demonstration in Seoul.
					
					 They accused the authorities of suppressing the above-said organizations and their core members, charging the legitimate activities of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon were "instructed by the north."
					
					 They branded the suppression as part of the moves to crack down upon the civilian pro-reunification movement, pursuant to the Lee Myung Bak "government's" policy of inciting confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 Noting that all the people would unite closer braving the authorities' suppression and get the "National Security Law" repealed at any cost, they stressed that the Koreans' movement for reunification based on the three principles of national reunification -- independence, peaceful reunification and the great national unity -- will go on.
					
					 Similar protest demonstrations were staged by members of various organizations against the authorities' suppression of the reunification movement in Kyonggi Province, South Kangwon Province, South Chungchong Province and other areas on the same day.

articles.title: Outbursts of Puppet Prime Minister Blasted
articles.content:
Outbursts of Puppet Prime Minister Blasted
Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- South Koreans from all walks of life strongly protested against the puppet prime minister's reckless remarks agitating brutal suppression of progressive forces.
					 The puppet prime minister at a "meeting of ministers in charge of public security" blustered on May 20 that "he would disallow all the large-scale demonstrations in the cities and thoroughly track down illegal demonstrators and take legal actions against them" allegedly to cope with "illegal demonstrations".
					
					 The Confederation of Trade Unions of south Korea in a statement criticized the outbursts let loose by the "prime minister", saying that they would only deteriorate the situation as they amount to adding fuel to fire.
					
					 The statement asserted that the struggle waged by the Freight Workers' Solidarity in Taejon was a protest against the present "government's" policy of favoring the tycoons and sacrificing the workers.
					
					 The authorities are, however, talking about taking strong countermeasures, a proclamation of a war against the people, the statement said, urging the authorities to immediately withdraw the suppressive step.
					
					 The joint meeting of citizens for candlelight demonstrations denounced it as an illegal act to violate the freedom of assembly and demonstration and the all-people measure committee against murder of evacuees in Ryongsan charged that it is illogical for the authorities to assert that they would ban all assemblies and demonstrations.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK to Be Celebrated in Switzerland
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK to Be Celebrated in Switzerland
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- A Swiss preparatory committee was formed in Basel on May 15 to celebrate the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to widely introduce and disseminate Kim Jong Il's works and his immortal exploits through media and hold colorful political and cultural events in the period from May 15 to June 20.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Brought out in Italy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Brought out in Italy
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Juche Philosophy Is an Original Revolutionary Philosophy" was brought out in booklet by the Unified Communist Party of Italy on May 19.
					 The work published on July 26, Juche 85 (1996) scientifically analyzes the limitations of the times of the preceding philosophies and the originality of the Juche philosophy and deals with the idea that the Juche philosophy is a revolutionary philosophy, political philosophy of the Workers' Party of Korea and the principled issues arising in the study, explanation and dissemination of the Juche philosophy.
